title: 1V1 FOR MYSTERY SKIN!
body: Anyone want to 1v1, loser gifts the winner a mystery skin?? No funny business but, i will be screens hotting messages and what not incase  you try **scam**.. hit me up if you wanna do it, either comment here or msg me.. My summoner ame is '**MARYJAYN**'.

replies.body: I am silver 4 but it was my first placement.
Im broke. So i cant :P Sorry
Is it ok for me to join, Im Gold 5 if that's ok?
how many mystery skins can you give? Cause there is at least 3 people who wants that mystery xD
sounds good, when can we do it? :)
Should I call my plat friend? :)   He has a long winning streak... He would want a skin for free
